pipeline_description: Spriggan is a pipeline used for assembly of bacterial whole genome sequence data and identification of antibiotic resistance genes.
pipeline_keywords: HAI/AR, AR, Bacterial, Genome Assembly, MLST

pipeline_description: Dryad is a Nextflow pipeline for examining prokaryote relatedness. Dryad can perform a reference free analysis and/or SNP analysis.
pipeline_keywords: Outbreak Investigation, Bacterial Relatedness, SNP, Phylogenetic Trees, Phylogenomics, Prokaryote Relatedness, Core genome

pipeline_description: A Nextflow workflow for reference-based amplicon consensus generation for SARS-CoV-2 and other organisms.
pipeline_keywords: SARS-CoV-2, Viral, Amplicon, Consensus, Sequencing, Reference-based, Monkeypox, Wastewater

pipeline_description: A species agnostic sequencing analysis workflow for paired-end Illumina sequencing quality control and serotyping of prokaryotes.
pipeline_keywords: Prokaryotes, Bacterial, QC, Serotyping, Illumina, Phylogenetic Analysis, Core genome, AMR

pipeline_description: A bioinformatics pipeline designed for the assembly and classification of Illumina and Nanopore influenza and RSV data using IRMA.
pipeline_keywords: Influenza, RSV, Viral, Assembly, Clade Assignment, Nextclade, Nanopore, Illumina, Wastewater

pipeline_description: A Nextflow workflow for long-read nanopore sequencing de novo assembly and polishing of microbial isolates.
pipeline_keywords: Nanopore, De novo assembly, Polishing, Microbial, Long-read, Flye, Unicycler

pipeline_description: A standardized Nextflow pipeline for genomic surveillance of healthcare-associated bacterial pathogens with focus on antimicrobial resistance.
pipeline_ownership: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
pipeline_keywords: Bacterial, HAI, AR, AMR, QC, Assembly, MLST, Plasmids, Healthcare-associated pathogens

pipeline_description: A bioinformatics pipeline for whole genome sequencing analysis of fungal organisms including reference-based SNP calling and tree building.
pipeline_ownership: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
pipeline_keywords: Fungal, WGS, SNP calling, Phylogenetic tree, Candida auris, Antifungal resistance, De novo assembly

pipeline_description: A highly configurable next-generation sequencing assembly pipeline for virus genomes using iterative refinement and adaptive reference editing.
pipeline_ownership: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
pipeline_keywords: Viral, Assembly, Influenza, RNA viruses, Adaptive assembly, Variant calling, Phasing

pipeline_description: An interactive dashboard for high-quality influenza and SARS-CoV-2 and RSV genome assembly annotation and curation using IRMA.
pipeline_ownership: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
pipeline_keywords: Influenza, SARS-CoV-2, RSV, Viral, GUI, Interactive dashboard, Genome curation, Quality control

pipeline_description: A Nextflow pipeline for metagenomic sequencing analysis to identify pathogens in complex samples using taxonomic classification and confidence metrics.
pipeline_ownership: Johns Hopkins University Applied Physics Laboratory
pipeline_keywords: Metagenomics, Pathogen detection, Taxonomy, Classification, Kraken2, Illumina, Nanopore, Clinical diagnostics
